document.full_text: with rare access to cirque du soleil's creative process, jason zinoman looks at the evolution of the theatrical company into an international brand, and he shows what goes on behind the scenes of the company's newest show that will have its debut in new york this month.
document.title: not your brother's circus: cirque du soleil prepares for return to new york
lines_and_colors: with rare access to cirque du soleil's creative process, jason zinoman looks at the evolution of the theatrical company into an international brand, and he shows what goes on behind the scenes of the company's newest show that will have its debut in new york this month.
